name: A Cosy Night In - Ludum Dare 46
name_original: A Cosy Night In - Ludum Dare 46
description:
After finishing the Game Jam you must but very drained, well sit down, relax, make some pixel art and listen to lo-fi beats and keep your creativity alive in A Cozy Night In. 

Tools:

Paper ball - Deletes everything on canvas.

Eraser - Selects the colour white.

Picture Frame - Displays finished art up at the top left and creates a new canvas

Credits:

AwkawrdWhale - Coding, Design, Art

Sesspxxl - Music - https://soundcloud.com/sesspxxl

V1.1 - Fixed Music not looping properly
